intro: Heliotropium spathulatum subsp. oculatum, commonly known as the eye-shaped heliotrope, is a flowering plant native to tropical and subtropical regions. It belongs to the family Malvaceae and is characterized by its distinctive, often purple or pink, tubular flowers.
